metadata.title: CVE-2021-3516 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: There's a flaw in libxml2's xmllint in versions before 2.9.11. An attacker who is able to submit a crafted file to be processed by xmllint could trigger a use-after-free. The greatest impact of this flaw is to confidentiality, integrity, and availability.

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.9.10+dfsg-6.3ubuntu0.1').
